snippet: The private equity giant Apollo Global Management said first-quarter profit increased 72 percent, to $792 million, as the value of its holdings rose and the firm sold some of its investments.
abstract: The private equity giant Apollo Global Management said first-quarter profit increased 72 percent, to $792 million, as the value of its holdings rose and the firm sold some of its investments.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Apollo's Profit Rose 72% in First Quarter
